Class Measure

java.lang.Object
  Measure

public class Measure
extends java.lang.Object

A measure is a collection of 16 chords.

Version:
3.27.18
Author:
Annabelle Perng

modifyChord

public void modifyChord(Note n,
                        int sixteenthPlace)
Alters the chord at a given location.

Parameters:
sixteenthPlace - the rhythmic location of the target chord
n - the Note to be added to or subtracted from the chord

playMeasure

public void playMeasure(int tempo)
Plays through 'this' measure at a given tempo.

Parameters:
tempo - the tempo to play the measure at

returnChordsInMeasure

public Chord[] returnChordsInMeasure()
Returns an array consisting of all chords in the measure.

Returns:
all chords inside the measure
